1.caption_en:
Caption: A platform AARRR funnel template (v5.0) that maps the customer lifecycle across five phases — Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Revenues, Referral — with side lanes for Consumers, Producers, and Partners and prompts for considerations and KPIs.

{
  "title": "PLATFORM AARRR FUNNEL",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "type": "template / funnel diagram",
  "phases_order": [
    "Acquisition",
    "Activation",
    "Retention",
    "Revenues",
    "Referral"
  ],
  "side_lanes": [
    "Consumers",
    "Producers",
    "Partners"
  ],
  "prompts": {
    "top_consider": "What are things to consider in each phase?",
    "bottom_metrics": "What are your leading KPIs for monitoring and optimization?"
  },
  "center_label": "CUSTOMER LIFETIME",
  "visual_elements": {
    "phase_flow_bar": "teal curved band across top",
    "lifecycle_arrow": "light blue horizontal arrow labeled CUSTOMER LIFETIME",
    "lower_flow_bar": "teal curved band along bottom",
    "vertical_dividers": 4,
    "dashed_dividers": true
  },
  "footer": {
    "source": "Platform Innovation Kit",
    "download_url": "www.platforminnovationkit.com",
    "license_hint": "CC (Creative Commons) indicated"
  }
}
